Air NZ

Brief:

Take flight management to new heights with the Air NZ app, designed to provide a streamlined experience for travelers flying with Air New Zealand. Stay informed with real-time flight updates, enjoy the convenience of on-the-go service purchases and lounge amenities, and keep tabs on your Airpointsâ„¢ effortlessly. Whether you're gearing up for a business trip or embarking on a leisurely vacation, the Air NZ app puts control in the palm of your hand.
